content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column]

  • ALL
  • Entertainment
  • Sports

ALL WORKS

LOTTE Downtown Duty-Free Pre-opening Concert 2019

Produced by Pulse Active, the concert was also the first concert of LOTTE Duty-Free and SM Entertainment in Vietnam opening a new era for K-Pop fans. This was part of a long-term plan to bring Korean entertainment closer to Vietnamese youth which means that more Korean artists will come to Vietnam for their next concerts in the future.
Check our more here.

ZEDD

We made it happen: the first live concert by multi-platinum, Grammy award-winning artist, DJ and producer Zedd in Vietnam! The chart-topping Russian-German musician performed a single show in Ho Chi Minh City at Rach Chiec Golf Driving Range in District 2 on August 7, 2015. Zedd's show was part of his True Colors Asia Tour. We gave fans the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to see this music legend perform live in HCMC on his first stop in the region, before appearing in the Philippines, Thailand and Japan. Check out a full video of the event here.  

Challenge Vietnam Triathlon

Challenge Vietnam was the first Challenge Family event held in Vietnam. It consists of a triathlon race with legs covering 1.9 km of swimming, 90 km of cycling and 21 km of running. This is a seriously tough competition, in which athletes can either compete individually or in a relay team. Held in Nha Trang, the beach capital of Vietnam, Challenge Vietnam includes activities such as a carbo load dinner and a race after-party on a rooftop with sweeping views of the stunning scenery. Check out more here.        

COLOR ME RUN

A new festival concept which fuses music, colored powder running into one exhilarating event. It has become a phenomenon, a must-attend festival in Vietnam, especially amongst millennials. Check our more here.

Manulife Danang International Marathon

The Danang International Marathon has been held in the namesake coastal city since 2013, offering four distances: Full Marathon, Half Marathon, 10km and 5km. The race was the first marathon in Vietnam to be certified by AIMS and become a Boston Marathon classifier. Check out more here.     

HCMC Marathon

This landmark annual event gathers thousands of people from around the world to run the dynamic streets of Ho Chi Minh City and conquer the formidable Phu My Bridge. Check out more here. 

Le Fruit Triathlon

Created in 2002, the unique, off-road Le Fruit Triathlon is the longest-standing multi-sport event in Vietnam. On the 10th of June 2017 will be held the 15th edition in The Grand Ho Tram Strip Resort, Ho Tram Beach, Ba Ria Vung Tau, Vietnam. Le Fruit Triathlon has maintained its spirit as a family-friendly celebration of off-road sports. The race is accessible to all, from beginner to amateur triathletes and from kids to adults. It includes five different categories with different distances: Sprinter (Individual), Sprinter (Relay), Duathlon, Rookie and Aero – Kids. Check out more here. 
 
       

PRISMA

What began as a crowd of people running together at night has become a movement which gathers people from around Vietnam for the most luminous night of the year. The Prisma Run creates new experiences every year, characterized by lights, sounds and stunning visual effects which hypnotize all participants. Check out the full Prisma video here.  

THE CHAINSMOKERS

Pulse Active brought the EDM-pop duo The Chainsmokers to Ho Chi Minh City for the first time, placing Vietnam firmly on the global EDM map. This was a crazy summer night at the hands of the famous DJ duo on their debut tour for Memories...Do Not Open.       

WeRace

This event welcomes corporate groups, families and friends to experience a friendly 21Km race. Each member of a team of four runs about 5km, and together they will complete a half marathon. This is a memorable event that will bring your team of friends or family even closer together! Check out more here.

Check our more here.
